name: Exam Game (EddieChen580418)
description:
List of controls 

Click the buttons for the corresponding actions 

Right button - move right

Left button - move left

Up button - jump

pause button - stop actions

Features:

- Deadly Wall

- Bouncy Platform

- Moving Deadly Walls 

- Invisible Platforms 

- Low gravity (moon)

- Lives UI/functionality 

- Sound Effects

- UI / title screen and end screens
